A sequencing batch reactor operating with sludge originating from the Niderglatt WWTP was operated with a sludge retention time of 1 day. Samples were withdrawn after exposing the reactor to a set of micropollutants.

A sequencing batch reactor operating with sludge originating from the Niderglatt WWTP was operated with a sludge retention time of 3 days. Samples were withdrawn after exposing the reactor to a set of micropollutants.
